bean.description: The bean 'tagsConfigurator' is used to set up the configuration of the custom tags of consortium ESUP-Portail (see esup-commons.tld).

property.name: servletMediaPath
property.description: The path to the media files, used for scripts.

property.name: portletMediaPath
property.description: The path to the media files, used for scripts and stylesheets.

property.name: scripts
property.description: A list of URLs that will be automatically included in the head part of the output document as scripts. Absolute URLs are used as-is, relative URLs are prefixed by property portletMediaPath or servletMediaPath.

property.name: stylesheets
property.description: A list of URLs that will be automatically included in the head part of the output document. Absolute URLs are used as-is, relative URLs are prefixed by property servletMediaPath. Warning: this tag is ignored for portlet installations.

property.name: sectionTag
property.description: The tag used to wrap the input of tag 'section'.

property.name: sectionStyleClass
property.description: The default CSS class used for tag 'section'.

property.name: subSectionTag
property.description: The tag used to wrap the input of tag 'subSection'.

property.name: subSectionStyleClass
property.description: The default CSS class used for tag 'subSection'.

property.name: paginatorStyleClass
property.description: The default CSS class used for tag 'paginator'.
